abstract: Walt Disney Studios got more thumbs up than down from the crowd as it previewed projects like “Maleficent”  and “Frozen,” the latter a likely Oscar contender.
snippet: Walt Disney Studios got more thumbs up than down from the crowd as it previewed projects like “Maleficent”  and “Frozen,” the latter a likely Oscar contender.
lead_paragraph: ANAHEIM, Calif. — For four hours on Friday and two hours on Saturday, Walt Disney Studios gave fans gathered at a convention here an extensive look into its movie pipeline. And while the crowd was a friendly one, Disney left nothing to chance.

headline.main: Disney Fans Get a Sneak Peek at Coming Films
